backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data types (Song, VoiceSample, VoicePersona, Cover, LyricsRequest) and public functions for uploading songs/voice samples, creating personas and covers, and managing lyrics-based song generation requests with persistent storage using Maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the requirement to remove the 2,000 character maximum limit from LyricsInput component while keeping the 20 character minimum, with high confidence and test ID REQ-37.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, hooks, and configuration files describing the persona-first workflow, voice recording/upload, song processing, library management, and UI styling with warm gradient color palette.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with warm orange-to-red gradient palette and design tokens for consistent theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the AI Voice Cover App.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing multi-view navigation (create/library/personas), workflow state (cover/generation modes), step progression with persona pre-selection support, and automatic navigation to Library view after processing completion.
frontend/src/components/AudioPlayer.tsx: Audio player component with play/pause controls, seek slider, volume control, time display, and song metadata display using custom useAudioPlayer hook.
frontend/src/components/DownloadButton.t: Download button component that retrieves audio bytes from ExternalBlob, creates a downloadable file with correct MIME type and extension based on selected format (MP3 or WAV), and shows loading state during download.
frontend/src/components/FormatSelector.t: Radio button group component for selecting audio download format between MP3 (compressed) and WAV (uncompressed) with visual indicators and format descriptions.
frontend/src/components/GenerationMode.t: Component for generating songs from lyrics with optional style prompts. Handles lyrics submission with voice sample ID and displays style keyword suggestions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with header, navigation tabs (Create, Library, Personas), and background styling. Provides app-wide structure and view switching.
frontend/src/components/Library.tsx: Displays user's song library with playback, download (MP3/WAV), and social sharing features. Integrates audio player and format selector components.
frontend/src/components/LyricsInput.tsx: Text area component for entering song lyrics with character count validation (minimum 20 characters) and submit button for song generation.
frontend/src/components/ModeSelector.tsx: Landing screen with two cards allowing users to choose between covering an existing song or generating a new song from lyrics.
frontend/src/components/Personas.tsx: Manages voice personas with create, delete, and select functionality. Includes dialog for creating new personas with voice samples and names.
frontend/src/components/ProcessingStatus: Displays processing progress for either cover creation or song generation workflows, showing stage-by-stage progress with animations and calling onComplete when finished.
frontend/src/components/SocialShare.tsx: Provides a dropdown menu for sharing songs to Facebook (via Web Share API or dialog) and YouTube (via upload dialog).
frontend/src/components/SongUpload.tsx: Handles song file upload (MP3/WAV/M4A) with metadata input (title, artist) and progress tracking, then uploads to backend actor.
frontend/src/components/StyleKeywords.ts: Displays clickable badge keywords (genres, effects, tempo) that users can select to add to their song style description.
frontend/src/components/VoiceInput.tsx: Provides a toggle between recording and uploading voice samples, rendering either VoiceRecorder or VoiceUpload component.
frontend/src/components/VoiceRecorder.ts: Records audio from microphone with visual feedback (duration, audio levels), then uploads the recording as a voice sample to the backend.
frontend/src/components/VoiceUpload.tsx: Allows users to upload audio files (MP3/WAV/M4A) as voice samples with file validation and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeUploadDia: Dialog component for uploading songs to YouTube with configurable title, description, and privacy settings. Currently shows a placeholder UI flow with simulated upload progress, as full YouTube integration requires OAuth2 server-side implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the ICP actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayer.ts: React hook providing audio playback controls including play/pause, seek, volume, and loading state management. Uses HTML5 Audio API with event listeners for time updates and playback status.
frontend/src/hooks/useGenerationStatus.t: React hook that simulates multi-stage song generation progress (analyzing, composing, synthesizing, mixing, mastering) with smooth progress updates. Returns status, progress percentage, and generated cover ID upon completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow and identity state. Handles AuthClient creation with configurable options and persists identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useProcessingStatus.t: React hook that orchestrates multi-stage audio processing with progress tracking and creates a cover record in the backend. Simulates processing stages with configurable durations and invokes callback with generated cover ID and audio blob.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including covers, lyrics requests, user library, and voice personas. Implements polling for pending requests and automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceRecorder.ts: React hook for recording audio from the microphone with real-time audio level monitoring and duration tracking. Uses MediaRecorder API and Web Audio API for recording and visualization, returning audio blob on stop.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space, plus base styling for body element.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers, mounting to the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that extends the default theme with custom colors mapped to CSS variables (using OKLCH), custom border radius values, animations for accordions, and includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata file describing an AI voice cover app that allows users to upload songs and apply their voice using AI synthesis, with features for voice recording/upload, song upload, audio processing, persona management, and export functionality. Contains a known issue that downloaded audio files do not play correctly.
